Package baccarat

Class BaccaratHand

java.lang.Object
baccarat.Hand
baccarat.BaccaratHand
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Comparable<BaccaratHand>
public class BaccaratHand
extends Hand
implements java.lang.Comparable<BaccaratHand>
This class represents a player with their hand. It handles functions for determining if they stand. It is a subclass of Hand.java
